main event: On 3 January 1960, a lady reported feeling watched and moved out of her home due to disturbances from a source of light.
interesting points: The witness claims she has a permanent abode near the noise and has been 'watched' by something., She is considering contacting Senator Robert Wagner about her situation., Reports included a mention of a 'light Russian missile' that fell near a Vice Admiral's residence., The lady also recovered a piece of garment from her house., There was no clear shape of the source of light, leading to a psychological case conclusion.
sighted object: source of light and a piece of garment
witness description: Mrs. aircraft observer residing in Bay Port, also has a beach-house and visits Manhattan.
